      • setModSeq

        public void setModSeq(long modSeq)
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Set the mod-sequence for the message. This must be called before the message is added to the store or any flags are changed. This must be unique / sequential.
        See Also:
        Message.setModSeq(long)

      • getBodyContent

        public InputStream getBodyContent()
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Gets the body content of the document. Headers are excluded. Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call, which basicly means it need to start at position 0
        Returns:
        body, not null
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        Message.getBodyContent()

      • getHeaderContent

        public InputStream getHeaderContent()
                             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Gets the header as InputStream. This MUST INCLUDE the CRLF terminator Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call
        Returns:
        header
        Throws:
        IOException
